com.tranek.chivalryserverbrowser

Class QueryWorker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tranek.chivalryserverbrowser.QueryWorker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<ChivServer>

     class QueryWorker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<ChivServer>
    The thread responsible for querying a specific server to get its data and location.

    • Field Summary

      protected java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService pool
      The pool of threads that this QueryWorker belongs to.

    • Constructor Detail

      • QueryWorker

        public QueryWorker(java.lang.String ip,
           int port,
           ServerFilters sf,
           QueryWorkerSynch synch,
           java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService pool,
           MainWindow mw)
        Creates a new QueryWorker.
        Parameters:
        ip - the IP address of the server
        port - the queryport of the server
        sf - the server filters to filter this server with
        synch - the synchronization object
        pool - the pool of threads that this QueryWorker belongs to
        mw - the MainWindow

    • Method Detail

      • call

        public ChivServer call()
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a new QueryServerCondenser to query the server. It then gets the server's location and adds the information to the server list table and to the MainWindow's list of currently queried servers.
        Specified by:
        call in interface java.util.concurrent.Callable<ChivServer>
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        Callable.call(), QueryServerCondenser.getInfo(), ChivServer.getGameMode(String), ChivServer.getLocation(MainWindow, String), QueryWorkerSynch
